place: Via S. Nicolò 30, II°, Trieste, Austria
author: James Joyce
text: Dear Stannie Could you possibly come here for a few days—by hook or crook? I want to speak to you on a very serious matter and it is so unsatisfactory writing. I hope you will not omit to answer this by return of post and, except to Aunt Josephine, you needn’t say anything about the matter. If you come in August or September I shall probably be able to give you board and lodgings and perhaps pay your fare back. Write at once. Jim
